name: APOLYclypse
description:
Hey everybody, I'm pretty new to game development but after going through the same mistakes as every other starting developer I have finally got a game to the point where I think other people could get at least a little bit of fun out of.

APOLYclypse is a fast paced first person zombie shooter in a low poly art style. The current build has 3 maps, 10 weapons and 1 game mode, Horde. Choose a weapon and try to survive an ever increasing swarm of zombies. Can you last long enough to clear the horde completely? Replenish ammo at the ammo crate found next to your trusty RV.

Difficulty can be customised by changing the amount of bites you can suvive before a game over. The zombie limit can also be adjusted to help with difficulty as well as performance issues older pcs may experience when large numbers zombies accumulate. This can be set from as little as 5 zombies all the way up to 250 for the intended experience.

Controls
  • WASD & mouse - Move
  • Left click - Shoot
  • Right click - Aim
  • Scroll wheel - Change weapon
  • Shift - Sprint
  • C - Crouch
  • R - Reload
  • E - Interact
  • ESC - Pause
Planned Updates
  • Boss zombies
  • More game modes
  • New highscore system
  • Short tutorial with time trial
  • Some kind of "Story Mode" that will unlock weapons
  • A new location added with each major update
